loadout:LoadoutBag.NAME: Loadout Bag
loadout:LoadoutBag.FLAVOR: A bag out of nowhere... Was it the hubris?
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to obtain any relic you want.

loadout:LoadoutBagAlt.NAME: Death Certificate
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to obtain any relic you want.

loadout:TheBin.NAME: The Bin
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to obliterate any relic you want.

loadout:TheBinAlt.NAME: The Void
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to void any relic you want.

loadout:LoadoutCauldron.NAME: The Cauldron
loadout:LoadoutCauldron.FLAVOR: Pinch of Death Cap, heel of shoe.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to obtain any potion you want.

loadout:LoadoutCauldronAlt.NAME: Mom's Bottle of Pills
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to obtain any potion you want.

loadout:CardPrinter.NAME: Card Printer
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to obtain any card you want; use during combat will also add it to your hand.
Obtain any cards. Hold Shift for x10, Ctrl for x5.

loadout:CardShredder.NAME: Card Shredder
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to obliterate any card you want; use during combat will also remove it from combat.
Destroy any cards.

loadout:CardModifier.NAME: Card Modifier
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to modify any card you want; right-click cards to modify them.
Upgrade any cards. Right-click a card to modify it.

loadout:CardPrinterAlt.NAME: Deck of Cards
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to obtain any card you want; use during combat will also add it to your hand.
Obtain any cards.

loadout:CardShredderAlt.NAME: Torn Card
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to obliterate any card you want; use during combat will also remove it from combat.
Destroy any cards.

loadout:CardModifierAlt.NAME: Blank Card
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to modify any card you want; right-click cards to modify them.
Upgrade any cards. Right-click a card to modify it.

loadout:EventfulCompass.NAME: Eventful Compass
loadout:EventfulCompass.FLAVOR: It always points to somewhere interesting
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to select the event you want.

loadout:EventfulCompassAlt.NAME: The Compass
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to select the event you want.

loadout:PowerGiver.NAME: Potion of Powers
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to select the power for you/monsters at the start/middle of combat. Left-click to increase, right-click to decrease. Ctrl x5, Shift x10. Alt + left-click to favorite

loadout:PowerGiverAlt.NAME: Lemegeton
loadout:PowerGiverAlt.FLAVOR: Grants you power... but at what cost?
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to select the power for you/monsters at the start/middle of combat. Left-click to increase, right-click to decrease. Ctrl x5, Shift x10. Alt + left-click to favorite

loadout:TildeKey.NAME: Tilde Key
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to select debug powers you want. Left Click fields to edit them.

loadout:TildeKeyAlt.NAME: Tilde Key
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to select debug powers you want. Left Click fields to edit them.

loadout:BottledMonster.NAME: Bottled Monster
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to spawn any monster you want.

loadout:BottledMonsterAlt.NAME: Friendly Ball
loadout:BottledMonsterAlt.FLAVOR: Gotta fetch 'em all! Wait... it is not user-friendly
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to spawn any monster you want.
